allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Russian language support with hreflang tags

- Create Russian versions of all pages under /ru/
- Add hreflang tags for SEO
- Add language switcher \(always visible on mobile\)
- Translate navigation, footer, and blog post
- Fix paragraph spacing to match industry standards

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Yukki''s Corner - Shiba Inu blog with Russian translation

- Complete Astro-based blog for Yukki the Shiba Inu
- Russian language support with hreflang tags
- Language switcher always visible on mobile
- Blog post: Welcome Home Yukki \(EN + RU\)
- Gallery, Tips, Contact, About pages

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
